title: How to Add a Registered Symbol in HTML

steps.headline: Open the HTML editor of your choice.
Place this HTML code '& # 1 7 4 ;' (special character HTML code for register symbol) or character code '& r e g;'(character code for register symbol).
Don't use spaces in between codes.
steps.description: Gap is because those numerical characters does not exist. Either a character or its HTML code will be use in html source code document.

steps.headline: You can also get list of many special characters here.
Once done, preview and save your document.

tyn: Access to HTML document's source code.
text: Open the HTML editor of your choice.  Place this HTML code '& # 1 7 4 ;' (special character HTML code for register symbol) or character code '& r e g;'(character code for register symbol).  Don't use spaces in between codes. Gap is because those numerical characters does not exist. Either a character or its HTML code will be use in html source code document. You can also get list of many special characters here.  Once done, preview and save your document.
sentences: Open the HTML editor of your choice.
Place this HTML code '& # 1 7 4 ;' (special character HTML code for register symbol) or character code '& r e g;'(character code for register symbol).
Don't use spaces in between codes.
Gap is because those numerical characters does not exist.
Either a character or its HTML code will be use in html source code document.
You can also get list of many special characters here.
Once done, preview and save your document.
